text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) vercel-labs/agent-browser | 96% | stars now 2576 → est 14277 (range 14252-14302)
   https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-browser
2) OthmanAdi/planning-with-files | 95% | stars now 8022 → est 15679 (range 15626-15732)
   https://github.com/OthmanAdi/planning-with-files
3) deepseek-ai/Engram | 94% | stars now 1211 → est 11510 (range 11485-11535)
   https://github.com/deepseek-ai/Engram
4) torvalds/AudioNoise | 94% | stars now 2836 → est 9223 (range 9198-9248)
   https://github.com/torvalds/AudioNoise
5) z-libs/Zen-C | 94% | stars now 1082 → est 7078 (range 7053-7103)
   https://github.com/z-libs/Zen-C

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
